headline: Trump Promised a Markets Boom. 100 Days In, Stocks Have Only Seen Damage
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Donald Trump promised Americans a “boom like no other” if they elected him president. headline: West's Critical Mineral Crisis: Why Perpetua Resources Is The Antimony Stock To Own
summary: Perpetua's Stibnite Gold Project offers significant antimony and gold reserves, aligning with US strategic interests. Read why PPTA stock is a Strong Buy.
